categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ma'tti was a male quartermaster for the Sith Empire who lived during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Ma'tti was stationed in the Dread Executioners camp on Oricon as a gear merchant.

Ma'tti first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, as a nightmare operation vendor for the two Oricon flashpoints, Dread Fortress and Dread Palace for two of the Imperial classes.. However, at some point between Game Updates 2.4 and 3.0, Ma'tti and the other Nightmare Tech vendors were removed from both the Republic and Imperial camps on Oricon as part of a restructuring of the gear system.
